TextLibrary.Text: There were more slavers than you thought. You must try again.
The Slavers have been routed. You may now return to the Emperor and tell him of your success.
The Emperor is pleased with you. He not only rewards you with gold, but also with a medal.
You must travel to the Slaver Camp and fight them.
You must now return to the Emperor for your reward.
This Minotaur has improved armor and a whip that deals damage whenever he matches Yellow Gems.
